cookieTitle: This website stores cookies on your computer.
cookieText: These allow us to remember who you are between pages and between visits and are used to collect information about how you interact with our website. We use this information in order to customize your experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors. To find out more about the cookies we use, see our
to download your file if it does not hap: to download your file if it does not happen automatically
we look forward to seeing you soon!: we look forward to seeing you soon!

unless you re-submit by the deadline.

We hope to see you at a future event!: We hope to see you at a future event!

and applications are now closed. Your ap: and applications are now closed. Your application will therefore not be considered

Please fix the errors before continuing.
applicationConfirmationText:
Please confirm that your answers are correct. Use the previous button to correct them if they are not. You can also exit and come back later as they have all been saved.
Click the SUBMIT button once you are happy to submit your answers to the committee.
You MUST click SUBMIT before the deadlin: You MUST click SUBMIT before the deadline for your application to be considered!
Your application will be reviewed by our: Your application will be reviewed by our committee and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
By continuing, your submitted applicatio: By continuing, your submitted application will go into draft state. You MUST press Submit again after you make your changes for your application to be considered in the selection.
Do you want to edit your application to: Do you want to edit your application to
Title: Title
Full Name as it appears on Passport.
Who the visa letter should be addressed: Who the visa letter should be addressed to, e.g. Immigration Officer of X Embassy
account has been created, but before you: account has been created, but before you can use it, we need to verify your email address. Please check your email (and spam folder) for a message containing a link to verify your email address.
if you already have an account: if you already have an account
I have read and agree to the: I have read and agree to the
An account with this email address alrea: An account with this email address already exists
for an account in order to apply for an: for an account in order to apply for an event, award or call for proposals
Invited guest with this email already ex: Invited guest with this email already exists.
User does not exist, please add these de: User does not exist, please add these details
We have re-sent your verification email,: We have re-sent your verification email, please check your inbox (and spam) and click on the link to verify your email address.
Are you sure? Click 'Reset Password' to: Are you sure? Click 'Reset Password' to receive an email with a link to reset your password.
There are currently no user profiles to: There are currently no user profiles to display!
referencesClosed: Unfortunately applications for {{eventName}} are now closed. If you still need to submit a reference for {candidateName}, please <5>contact the organisers</5>
Thank you! You submitted your reference: Thank you! You submitted your reference on {{submittedTimestamp}}. You may update it below if you like.
Kindly upload your reference in support: Kindly upload your reference in support of their application in the form of a PDF (max 10Mb) below.
Thank you! Your reference has been recei: Thank you! Your reference has been received and will be reviewed by our selection committee.
Your password reset request has been pro: Your password reset request has been processed. Please check your email for a link that will allow you to change your password.
You have completed all your reviews! Ple: You have completed all your reviews! Please let us know if you have any capacity for more
Please quote this in any correspondence: Please quote this in any correspondence with admins outside of the system.
There are one or more validation errors,: There are one or more validation errors, please correct before submitting.
If reviewing this response revealed an i: If reviewing this response revealed an issue that should be considered if this candidate were accepted, please describe it below.
Name: Name
Add new reviewer's email (they must alre: Add new reviewer's email (they must already have an account)
verified: Your email address has been verified. <1>Click here</1> to login if you are not automatically redirected.
is now over. You may still visit our vir: is now over. You may still visit our virtual event site.

You have {{numReviews}} reviews assigned: You have {{numReviews}} reviews assigned, of which {{numCompleted}} are completed
You have completed all your reviews, tha: You have completed all your reviews, thank you!
Filter the table above then enter a revi: Filter the table above then enter a reviewer's email to assign them the filtered rows (the reviewer must already have a Baobab account)
There are no more reviewers available: There are no more reviewers available
Allow candidates to nominate others usin: Allow candidates to nominate others using this application form (Users will be able to submit multiple nominations, including for themselves. If this option is unchecked, a candidate can only apply for themselves)

Question {{element}} is a dependency of: Question {{element}} is a dependency of other sections/questions. Are you sure you still want to delete it?

You must enter at least {{min}} words: You must enter at least {{min}} words
Please enter a list of file extensions,: Please enter a list of file extensions, each starting with a period and separated with commas. E.g .csv,.xls

An application form is required to save: An application form is required to save the review form
Application open date cannot be in the p: Application open date cannot be in the past
Application close date must be after app: Application close date must be after application open date
Review close date must be after review o: Review close date must be after review open date

Registration open date must be after rev: Registration open date must be after review close date
Event start date must be after registrat: Event start date must be after registration close date

Event name in French is required: Event name in French is required
Event description in English is required: Event description in English is required
Event description in French is required: Event description in French is required
Event key must be less than 16 character: Event key must be less than 16 characters and contain no spaces
No event exists with that ID: No event exists with that ID
Event and/or event fee not found: Event and/or event fee not found
Access to this resource is forbidden: Access to this resource is forbidden
No event exists with that KEY: No event exists with that KEY

Event must contain at least one translat: Event must contain at least one translation for 'name' and 'description'
Event must contain same translations for: Event must contain same translations for 'name' and 'description'

review-assignment-filter-note: If you have selected tag filters, then only responses matching those tags will be assigned. Note that the total unallocated review count takes the tag filters into account, but the No. assigned and No. Completed in the table do not.
Tag name in English is required: Tag name in English is required
Tag name in French is required: Tag name in French is required
Tag description in English is required: Tag description in English is required
Tag description in French is required: Tag description in French is required
We are pleased to offer you the followin: We are pleased to offer you the following grants
Please note that this offer does not inc: UPlease note that this offer does not include any grants. We appreciate your understanding.

Please see the details of this offer bel: Please see the details of this offer below
registrationFee: In order to confirm your place, you will be liable for a {{paymentAmount}} {{paymentCurrency}} registration fee.
Please accept or reject this offer by: Please accept or reject this offer by

paymentRequired: Payment of {{paymentAmount}} {{paymentCurrency}} is required to confirm your place

spotAccepted: You accepted the following offer on {{respondedDate}}
